title: 99% Chance of Magic: Stories of Strength and Hope for Transgender Kids
description: Join Heartspark Press on an adventure of the heart in 99% Chance of Magic, the world's first literary collection for transgender children, all written & illustrated by trans women and (C)AMAB non-binary creatives. Our stories explore a variety of wondrous worlds, but one goal connects them all: to cast a protection spell of hope and strength for transgender and non-binary kids everywhere.Curated by Amy Eleanor Heart & Abbey DarlingCopyedited by Eyota Wak'ishwit & Luna MerbrujaProduced by Luna Merbruja
author: Amy Eleanor Heart
